content.body: Jack Works: When you introduce CoverXandY, you need to use it (instead of X or Y) in those contexts where the conflict/ambiguity exists. So if you're introducing CoverExpressionStatementAndWhatever, you'd have to change the Statement production to use that instead of ExpressionStatement. I think.
content.formatted_body: Jack Works: When you introduce CoverXandY, you need to use it (instead of X or Y) in those contexts where the conflict/ambiguity exists. So if you're introducing CoverExpressionStatementAndWhatever, you'd have to change the Statement production to use that instead of ExpressionStatement. I think.

content.body: Mind you, I'm not sure you should be covering ExpressionStatement.
